FILE (GLOB_RECURSE CXX_SRC_FILES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp")

ADD_LIBRARY (implot STATIC ${CXX_SRC_FILES})

TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS (implot PUBLIC "_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS")

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (implot PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (implot PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/implot")

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (implot PUBLIC imgui)
